Name: Random
Description: A different rule change[;] chosen randomly.

Name: Lady Luck
Description: All enemy equipment is upgraded.

Name: Wolf Puppy
Description: Both you and your enemies start each|fight with [fury]Fury[].

Name: Sorceress
Description: Enemies can throw unused dice at you.

Name: Drake
Description: Enemies get 20% extra health.

Name: Scathach
Description: You are [curse]Cursed[] at the start of|every turn.

Name: Loud Bird
Description: Enemies will [dodge]Dodge[] your first|attack every turn.

Name: Buster
Description: Burning dice cost [heart]5[] hp to extinguish.

Name: Snowman
Description: One of your dice is [ice]Frozen at the|start of every turn.

Name: Fireman
Description: One of your dice is [fire]Burning at the|start of every turn.

Name: Singer
Description: On your first turn[;] all your dice rolls|are the same number.

Name: Vacuum
Description: Enemies get 10% extra health.

Name: Sticky Hands
Description: Enemies have a chance to go first.
Rule Change: Rules.addextrascript(~var goesfirst = false; if((self.maxhp / self.hp) < 2) { goesfirst = chance(60); } else { goesfirst = chance(20); } if(goesfirst){ target.innate.push(\~goesfirst\~); }~[;] ~startcombat~);

Name: Mimic
Description: Everything in the dungeon looks like|a treasure chest.

Name: Baby Squid
Description: One of your dice is [blind]Blinded at the|start of every turn.

Name: Haunted Jar
Description: Poison is no longer reduced by 1|each turn.

Name: Paper Knight
Description: Start with 2 extra dice. Lose 1 dice|every turn[;] until you have just 1 left.
Rule Change: Rules.addextrascript(~self.extradice = 3;~[;] ~startcombat~); Rules.addextrascript(~self.extradice--; if(self.dice + self.extradice < 1) self.extradice = 1- self.dice;~[;] ~beforestartturn~);

Name: Robobot
Description: If your CPU counter exceeds the|target[;] take [heart]5[] damage.

Name: Dire Wolf
Description: The odds of [curse]Curse[] triggering is|reduced to 25%.

Name: Banshee
Description: Instead of causing equipment to fail[;]|[curse]Curse[] reverses your target.

Name: Madison
Description: Enemies start each fight with [fury]Fury[].

Name: Bully
Description: All enemies get a Rock.

Name: Skeleton
Description: Lose a dice.

Name: Cornelius
Description: Lose [heart]10[] max health.

Name: Cowboy
Description: Enemies always roll a 6.

Name: Handyman
Description: You need an even dice to unshock|[shock]Shocked[] equipment.

Name: Warlock
Description: Status effects are different.

Name: Alchemist
Description: After 4 turns[;] all enemies transform|into bears.

Name: Bounty Hunter
Description: You will never roll a 6.

Name: Rose
Description: Both you and your enemies do +[sword]1|extra damage with each attack.

Name: Cactus
Description: When you defeat an enemy[;] excessive|damage is reflected back at you.

Name: The Thief
Description: Switch to [quote]Finders Keepers[quote] rules.

Name: Ned
Description: All equipment you find is upgraded.

Name: Slime
Description: Start each fight with [poison]2 poison.
Rule Change: Rules.addplayerinnatestatus(POISON[;] 2[;] true); Rules.addextrascript(~if(turn == 1){ removestatusself(POISON[;] 1); pierceattackself(2|POISON); sfxdamage(self[;]2); sfx(\~_poison\~[;]\~\~[;]0.2); }~[;] ~onstartturn~);

Name: Wisp
Description: No duplicates! Matching dice vanish|as soon as they are created.

Name: Sneezy
Description: Using any piece of equipment will|reroll a random dice.

Name: Val
Description: At the start of each turn[;] replace one|of your items with a random item.

Name: Yolanda
Description: Shops can sell any item from the game.

Name: Rat King
Description: Add two super enemies.

Name: Kraken
Description: Cannot see enemy health after|the first turn.

Name: Hothead
Description: If you or your enemy rolls a six[;] it|automatically catches on fire.

Name: Pirate
Description: Both you and your enemies start each|fight with [recycle]Re-Equip_Next[].

Name: Rotten Apple
Description: Maximum health no longer increases|when you level up.

Name: The Inventor
Description: Reduce scrap choices to two. The|second choice is hidden.

Name: Marshmallow
Description: Swap all [fire]Fire equipment for [ice]Ice|equipment[;] and vice versa.
Rule Change: var database = loaddata(~diceydungeons/remixes/marshmallow~); trace(database); for(eq in database) Rules.swap(eq.fire_equipment[;] eq.ice_equipment);

Name: Space Marine
Description: Enemies countdowns reduce at|double the normal rate.

Name: Wizard
Description: All enemies get an extra dice.

Name: Beatrice
Description: On your first turn[;] all of your|equipment is [shock]Shocked.

Name: Keymaster
Description: You can't make more than six|moves per turn.

Name: Crystalina
Description: Keep unused dice until your next turn.|Lose [heart]1 hp for each dice you keep.

Name: Frog
Description: Any enemy can potentially be the|boss of the dungeon.

Name: The Witch
Description: One spell slot contains a completely|random spell each turn.

Name: Wicker Man
Description: Instead of causing damage[;] burning|dice disables equipment.

Name: Yeti
Description: Instead of setting dice to 1[;]|[ice]Freeze reduces all dice by 1.

Name: Gardener
Description: [shock]Shock costs health instead of dice.|[weaken]Weaken[] also inflicts [shock]Shock[].

Name: Drain Monster
Description: When [poison]Poison deals damage[;] it also|inflicts [weaken]1 weaken.

Name: Rhino Beetle
Description: Take [heart]2 damage at the start of each|turn[;] unless your limit break is full.

Name: Magician
Description: At the start of your turn[;] change the|dice requirements for a random item.

Name: The Robot
Description: Switch to ~You Choose[;] You Lose~|rules.

Name: Banshee?
Description: Instead of reversing your target[;]|[curse]Curse[] causes equipment to fail.

Name: Warlock?
Description: Status effects are… different?

Name: Wicker Man?
Description: Instead of disabling equipment[;]|burning dice cause damage.

Name: Yeti?
Description: Instead of reducing all dice by 1[;]|[ice]Freeze sets a die's value to 1.

Name: Gardener?
Description: [shock]Shock costs dice instead of health.|[weaken]Weaken[] also inflicts [shock]Shock[].
